revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=LaCie |model=Network Space |revision=2 |asin=B003GQEJ8Y |newegg=N82E16822154453 |price=160 |est_release_date=02/2010 |is_manuf=No |availability=discontinued |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L4005A |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS1G831CFP-S6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA, |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J12,, |serial=yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, J2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C04C;;1; ,,, 3A, 28V, 1.4MHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2365DN;;1; ,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverters;Texas Instruments;AHC14;;1; ,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-AND Gates;Texas Instruments;AHC08;;1; ,,, Dual Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop;Texas Instruments;AHC74;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.16; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.14;KW LSP 5.0.3; |tp_firmware=Debian, |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui_eth=00:D0:4B }} {{TagLine|LaCie Network Space 2}} :[https://www.lacie.com/support/network-storage/network-space-2/ Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://www.lacie.com/gb/en/support/network-storage/network-space-2/ Support page]
"LaCie", "0901 140", "Rev D", "NS_IS ASTON" are silkscreened on the board.
*[http://lacie-nas.org/doku.php?id=network_space_v2| ''LaCie Network Space v2'' on the '''LaCie-NAS''' Wiki] (internal images)
===Hardware=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 A0 (Kirkwood) :SoC: ARM926EJ-S (ARMv5TE) @800MHz *Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L4005CMI-12G (SPI NOR 512kB) *RAM: ''Hynix'' HY5PS1G831 256MB (DDR2 @267MHz) *LAN: [[Marvell]] 88E1116R (Ethernet Gigabit port PHY) *SATA: 1x SATA port (2x ports for Network Space Max v2) *USB: 2x USB 2.0 port (1x Host, 1x Device) *I2C EEPROM: 512 bytes ([[Atmel]] AT24C04 type) *2x LEDs (blue and red with CPLD SATA activity blink)
===See also=== :[[:Category:LaCie]] *[[LaCie Cloudbox]] *[[LaCie CloudBox (mini)]] *[[LaCie d2 Network 2]] *[[LaCie LaPlug]] *[[LaCie Network Space 2]]
